channel.title: Authors on GriffithVIII
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on GriffithVIII

item.description: Benito Palacios (also known as pleonex) is a Software Engineer. He studied Electrical Engineering with specialty in Telematics (network infrastructure and protocols) in Granada, Spain. He really loves programming, especially in C# and Python. His hobby is reverse engineering of video games. In his free time, he works with game fan-translation groups in a role of Localization Engineer figuring out and creating programs to edit image and text files. But, as Linus Torvalds said “Talk is cheap.
